original: dper na bye brag bas rang gis khas blangs bas chos can sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba na /
analyzed: dper na bye brag bas rang gis khas blangs bas chos can sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba na /
translated: For example, when the Vaiśeṣika proves to a Buddhist that sound is impermanent,

original: des bum pa'i dbang gis bya ba pa nyid mi 'khrul ba can yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: des bum pa'i dbang gis bya ba pa nyid mi 'khrul ba can yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: then by the power of the pot, the property of being a product is not mistaken.

original: brda sgrod pa bas 'dod @246b pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa la yang sgra nyid kyi dpe'i dbang gis mnyan bya nyid mi 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: brda sgrod pa bas 'dod @246b pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa la yang sgra nyid kyi dpe'i dbang gis mnyan bya nyid mi 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, when the grammarian proves to the Buddhist that the object of desire is permanent, by the power of the example of sound, the property of being audible is not mistaken.

original: des na 'di'i rang gi khas blangs pa la ltos te /
analyzed: des na 'di'i rang gi khas blangs pa la ltos te /
translated: Therefore, in relation to their own assertions,

original: gnyi ga yang sgrub par byed par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang sgrub par byed par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: it follows that both are proofs.

original: des 'di nyid la phan tshun 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: des 'di nyid la phan tshun 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are mutually contradictory.

original: des na / bdag cag la ni ma 'brel na //
analyzed: des na / bdag cag la ni ma 'brel na //
translated: Thus, for us,

original: ci ltar mi 'khrul ba yin zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar mi 'khrul ba yin zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the error “How can it be non-mistaken if it is not related?” does not exist.

original: de skad du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi khas blangs pa nyid brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de skad du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi khas blangs pa nyid brjod pa'o //
translated: “In that way” and so on state the assertion of the other.

original: khas blangs pa zhes bya ba ni brda sprod pa bas so //
analyzed: khas blangs pa zhes bya ba ni brda sprod pa bas so //
translated: “Assertion” is by the grammarian.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya'o //
translated: The word “alone” is to be supplied.

original: sgra nyid kyi spyi rtag pa dper yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid kyi spyi rtag pa dper yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the universal of sound is permanent, it is an example.

original: 'jig pa nyid la mnyan bya nyid ci ltar ma mthong zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig pa nyid la mnyan bya nyid ci ltar ma mthong zhe na /
translated: How is it that audibility is not seen in impermanent things?

original: rtag pa nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said that it is in permanent things.

original: mnyan bya nyid ni dpe sgra nyid la mthong ba'i phyir na go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid ni dpe sgra nyid la mthong ba'i phyir na go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since audibility is seen in the example of sound, it becomes the reason for understanding.

original: 'chad pa ni go bar byed pa'i zhes byang ste /
analyzed: 'chad pa ni go bar byed pa'i zhes byang ste /
translated: The explanation is that which causes understanding.

original: rtag pa nyid la mnyan bya'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la mnyan bya'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: Audibility is the reason for permanence.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i go byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i go byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The definition of that which causes understanding according to others is stated:

original: mthong ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That which is seen” and so on.

original: go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa rtags kyi rgyu nyid do //
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa rtags kyi rgyu nyid do //
translated: The reason that causes understanding is the cause of understanding through a sign.

original: 'dis ni bye brag pa'i lugs la gnas te /
analyzed: 'dis ni bye brag pa'i lugs la gnas te /
translated: This is based on the Vaiśeṣika system.

original: brda sprod pa pas nye bar bkod pa'i sgrub par byed pa go byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: brda sprod pa pas nye bar bkod pa'i sgrub par byed pa go byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: It states the definition of that which causes understanding, as presented by the grammarians.

original: de ltar de'i grub pa'i mtha' la brten nas mnyan par bya ba nyid bsgrubs pa na /
analyzed: de ltar de'i grub pa'i mtha' la brten nas mnyan par bya ba nyid bsgrubs pa na /
translated: Thus, when the fact that sound is to be heard is established on the basis of that philosophical position,

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos gsungs pa /
translated: the master Dignāga says:

original: mnyan bya nyid go bar byed bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid go bar byed bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “It is understood that sound is to be heard.”

original: nam gyi dus na zhe na ;
analyzed: nam gyi dus na zhe na ;
translated: At what time?

original: gal te 'dir zhes bya ba sgra las bye brag pa 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: gal te 'dir zhes bya ba sgra las bye brag pa 'ga' zhig go //
translated: If here, then by the word “here” some particular is intended.

original: nye bar bkod pa'i mnyan bya dang byas pa nyid la /
analyzed: nye bar bkod pa'i mnyan bya dang byas pa nyid la /
translated: In the case of the example of sound that is to be heard and that which is produced,

original: gal te 'di gnyi ga la yang dpe'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa nyid du khas len na de'i tshe the tshom za'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di gnyi ga la yang dpe'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa nyid du khas len na de'i tshe the tshom za'o //
translated: if it is accepted that understanding is by the power of the example, then at that time there is doubt.

original: gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya dang byas pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya dang byas pa'o //
translated: “Both” means both that which is to be heard and that which is produced.

original: brten na zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'o //
analyzed: brten na zhes bya ba ni bye brag pa'o //
translated: “If it is based” means if it is based on the Vaiśeṣika.

original: shin du dgos par chud pa nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: shin du dgos par chud pa nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression “it is utterly necessary” is

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //🔽gal te bye brag ba khyod sgra mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o // gal te bye brag ba khyod sgra mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod pa ni /
translated: “thus.”🔽If you Vaiśeṣikas assert that sound is impermanent,

original: de'i tshe spyi sgra nyid kyang rtag par 'dod pa dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe spyi sgra nyid kyang rtag par 'dod pa dor bar bya'o //
translated: then at that time you should abandon the assertion that the universal “sound” is permanent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: @247a * // de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ste sgra nyid kyi dpe'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: @247a * // de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ste sgra nyid kyi dpe'i sgo nas so //
translated: Because of that, i.e., because of the example of sound.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid du ma zad kyi mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid du ma zad kyi mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang ngo //
translated: Moreover, i.e., not only because of being produced, but also because of being audible.

original: 'on te byas pa kho na go byed yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te byas pa kho na go byed yin no zhe na /
translated: But if only being produced is the reason,

original: rigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is not reasonable.

original: dpel  yod pa mthong ba ni /
analyzed: dpel  yod pa mthong ba ni /
translated: The example of seeing what exists

original: byas pa dang mnyan bya nyid kyi rigs pa mtshungs pa yin te /🔽de dang ldan pa mnyan bya nyid kyi gtan tshigs ltar zhes bya ba mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byas pa dang mnyan bya nyid kyi rigs pa mtshungs pa yin te / de dang ldan pa mnyan bya nyid kyi gtan tshigs ltar zhes bya ba mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: is similar to the reason of being produced and being audible.

original: de ltar na ni zhes bya ba ni mi mtshungs pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de ltar na ni zhes bya ba ni mi mtshungs pa yin na'o //
translated: If it were like that, i.e., if it were like the reason of being audible, it would not be similar.

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni rigs rigs par ma gyur na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni rigs rigs par ma gyur na'o //
translated: If it were like that, i.e., if it were not reasonable,

original: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni rigs pa de dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs byas pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa der yang gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' dag ces bya ba ni rigs pa de dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs byas pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa der yang gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the convention of reason would be cut off for all, i.e., for any reason such as being produced that possesses that reason.

original: gal te gang gis 'di yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mnyan bya nyid ci ltar rigs pa mtshungs pa can yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang gis 'di yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mnyan bya nyid ci ltar rigs pa mtshungs pa can yin zhe na /
translated: If someone says: How is it proper to listen to this, which is similar to that?

original: mnyan bya nyid kyang zhes bya pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid kyang zhes bya pa'o //
translated: It is said: Even the state of being heard...

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni mnyan bya nyid do //
translated: Here, this refers to the state of being heard.

original: byas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la de las bzlog pa ni rtag pa nyid de /
analyzed: byas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la de las bzlog pa ni rtag pa nyid de /
translated: The probandum of the effect is impermanence, and the opposite of that is permanence.

original: de la 'khrul pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no error in that.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i'o //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i'o //
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-first chapter of the Root Verses of the Middle Way.

original: slob dpon gyi dgongs pa nges pa la de'i gzhung dbang nyid du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dgongs pa nges pa la de'i gzhung dbang nyid du brjod pa ni /
translated: The master's intention is ascertained, and his text is declared to be authoritative.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said: Well then...

original: skabs kyi mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs kyi mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion of the section is stated: Therefore...

original: ma 'brel pa ste bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel ba ma nges pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin pas na /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa ste bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel ba ma nges pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin pas na /
translated: It is disconnected, because the cause of doubt is the uncertainty of the connection to the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the definition of the reason and so on is pervasion.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni phyogs kyi chos dang bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni phyogs kyi chos dang bcas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: The definition of a reason is: that which is related to the probandum and is possessed of the property of the subject.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa 'gal ba ni phyogs kyi chos dang bcas pa'i bsgrub bya las bzlog par khyab pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa 'gal ba ni phyogs kyi chos dang bcas pa'i bsgrub bya las bzlog par khyab pa'o //
translated: A fallacious reason is contradictory if it is pervaded by the contrapositive of the probandum and is possessed of the property of the subject.

original: ma nges pa'i ni de dang lhan cig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa ma nges pa ste//
analyzed: ma nges pa'i ni de dang lhan cig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa ma nges pa ste//
translated: It is inconclusive if it is not ascertained to be related to the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa mtha' dag mtshan nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa mtha' dag mtshan nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: All contradictory and inconclusive reasons are pervaded by the definition.

original: des na mtshan nyid ma khyab pa'i nyes pa med do //
analyzed: des na mtshan nyid ma khyab pa'i nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of the definition not pervading.

original: gal te khyad par ma brjod ba'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa yang gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'am ma nges par 'gyur ro zhes @247b dgos na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par ma brjod ba'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa yang gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'am ma nges par 'gyur ro zhes @247b dgos na /
translated: If one says: “Because the qualifier is not stated, even that which is not the property of the subject would be a contradictory or inconclusive reason,”

original: de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [the response is:] “In that case, it is so.”

original: phyin ci log ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog bas khyab ba'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog bas khyab ba'o //
translated: The opposite is pervaded by the contrapositive of the probandum.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang 'brel ba ma nges ba'o //🔽gal te ci ltar 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i /
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang 'brel ba ma nges ba'o // gal te ci ltar 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i /
translated: The other is the one that is not ascertained to be related to the probandum.

original: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba sgra gzhan yin pa de bzhin dum grub pa'i yang ci ste mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba sgra gzhan yin pa de bzhin dum grub pa'i yang ci ste mi 'dod ce na /
translated: If it is asked, “Why is it not accepted that the term ‘property of the subject’ is a different word in the same way as the words ‘contradictory’ and ‘uncertain’?”

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, “because of that.”

original: ci ltar 'gal ba la sogs pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i sgra gzhan yod pa de bzhin du ma grub pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal ba la sogs pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i sgra gzhan yod pa de bzhin du ma grub pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: The term ‘property of the subject’ is a different word in the case of contradictory and uncertain reasons, but it is not in the case of unestablished reasons.

original: 'on kyang ma grub pa'i spyi ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ma grub pa'i spyi ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa kho na yin no //
translated: However, the general term ‘unestablished’ is not a property of the subject.

original: 'di yang rnam grangs kyi sgra yin gyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sgra ni 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i rnam grangs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang rnam grangs kyi sgra yin gyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sgra ni 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i rnam grangs ma yin te /
translated: This is a term that is a synonym, but the term ‘property of the subject’ is not a synonym for contradictory and uncertain reasons,

original: yang dag pa'i sgrub byed kyang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sgrub byed kyang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a correct proof is also not a property of the subject.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa dag ni nga rang gi ming gis bsnyad par bya ba yin gyis chos can ma grub pa la sogs ci ltar de ltar bsnyad par bya ba zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa dag ni nga rang gi ming gis bsnyad par bya ba yin gyis chos can ma grub pa la sogs ci ltar de ltar bsnyad par bya ba zhe na /
translated: If it is not an establishment of its own nature, then the proof is to be expressed by its own name. How can it be expressed in terms of the non-establishment of the subject, etc.?

original: chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The subject is called the pakṣa.

original: ma grub pa nyid yin la zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos ma yin na'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid yin la zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos ma yin na'o //
translated: The non-establishment is the non-property of the position.

original: gang yang rung ba lam grub pa lam grub pa nyid do zhes rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba lam grub pa lam grub pa nyid do zhes rjes su 'jug go //
translated: The establishment of either is the establishment of the property of the position.

original: 'di dag kyang phyogs chos kyi sgras khyad par du bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang phyogs chos kyi sgras khyad par du bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: These are not to be distinguished by the term property of the position. This is the meaning.

original: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol dag la'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol dag la'o //
translated: Both refers to the proponent and the opponent.

original: grub pa'i chos sgrub par byed pas tha snyad byed pa'i phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba ma grub pa ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: grub pa'i chos sgrub par byed pas tha snyad byed pa'i phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba ma grub pa ni mi 'dod do //
translated: Since the establishment of the property is expressed by the proof, the non-establishment called the reversal is not accepted.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la mig gis bzung ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la mig gis bzung ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, the fact that it is perceived by the eye is not established for both parties.

original: rgol ba'am phyir rgol ba gcig la ma grub pa yang sgrub byed du mi 'dod de /
analyzed: rgol ba'am phyir rgol ba gcig la ma grub pa yang sgrub byed du mi 'dod de /
translated: Nor is a reason that is not established for one of the parties accepted as a proof.

original: dper na bde ba la sogs pa sems pa med par sgrub pa la gtan tshigs skye ba can nam mi rtag ba nyid ni rgol ba grangs can rang nyid lam grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bde ba la sogs pa sems pa med par sgrub pa la gtan tshigs skye ba can nam mi rtag ba nyid ni rgol ba grangs can rang nyid lam grub pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the proof that pleasure and so on are not mental, the reason, being produced or impermanent, is not established for the Samkhya opponent.

original: shing rnams sems pa yod par bsgrub par bya ba la shun pa thams cad bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ma grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shing rnams sems pa yod par bsgrub par bya ba la shun pa thams cad bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ma grub pa bzhin no //
translated: And in the proof that trees have consciousness, the reason, because they die when all their bark is removed, is not established for the Buddhist opponent.

original: chos can ma grub pa yang sgrub par byed pa mi 'dod de /🔽dper na bdag gi khyab pa yin te /🔽yon @248a * //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa yang sgrub par byed pa mi 'dod de / dper na bdag gi khyab pa yin te / yon @248a * //
translated: Nor is a reason that is not established with regard to the subject accepted as a proof.

original: tan thams cad na dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: tan thams cad na dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof that the self is all-pervading, the reason, because it is the substratum of all qualities, is not established with regard to the subject, the self.

original: de bzhin du dper brjod pa gzhan dag kyang tshad ma rnam par nges pa la sogs par brjod pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dper brjod pa gzhan dag kyang tshad ma rnam par nges pa la sogs par brjod pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, other examples are stated in the Ascertainment of Valid Cognition and so forth. Therefore, they should be understood from there.

original: gal te chos kyi phyogs ma yin pa yang gtan tshigs su mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi phyogs ma yin pa yang gtan tshigs su mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the non-property of the subject is not seen as the reason,

original: de ci ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs su brjod ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs su brjod ce na /
translated: how can the property of the subject be stated as the reason?

original: phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni /
translated: The opponent's position is stated:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” means “if it were to exist.”

original: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
translated: At that time, then is extracted from within,

original: 'o ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'o ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: and how is it... and so on are applied.

original: sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs brjod pa ni byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis so //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs brjod pa ni byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis so //
translated: In this sound is impermanent, the statement of the reason is twofold, beginning with because it is produced.

original: rgyu'i bdag nyid la 'bras bu snga na yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyu'i bdag nyid la 'bras bu snga na yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: In establishing that the effect exists prior to the nature of the cause,

original: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub byed yin no //
analyzed: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub byed yin no //
translated: because a non-existent is not produced and so on are the proof.

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin na /
translated: If the property of the subject is the reason,

original: de'i tshe sgra mi rtag ste byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ci ltar sgrub byed yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra mi rtag ste byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ci ltar sgrub byed yin te /
translated: At that time, how could the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is produced” be a proof?

original: phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is not a property of the subject.

original: sbyor ba gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / bsgrub bya med na med pa dag lnga pas te lnga pa'i mtha' can gyis brjod pa der ni chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba gang du gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / bsgrub bya med na med pa dag lnga pas te lnga pa'i mtha' can gyis brjod pa der ni chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe brjod pa yin no //
translated: In a syllogism where the pervasion and the forward pervasion are stated by the fifth case, the fifth case ending, there the example is stated by the similarity of the property and the dissimilarity of the property.

original: 'di ltar sgra mi rtag go zhes bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra mi rtag go zhes bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent,

original: byas ba mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di dpe rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe bum pa dang nam mkha' dag la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pa yin
analyzed: byas ba mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di dpe rtag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni chos mthun pa nyid can dang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe bum pa dang nam mkha' dag la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pa yin
translated: the statement “because it is produced” is an example of similarity of the property. The statement “because it is permanent and not produced” is an example of dissimilarity of the property. The statement “like a pot” is an example of similarity of the property. The statement “like space” is an example of dissimilarity of the property.

original: te / des na sbyor ba gnyi ga la yang sgra mi rtag ste zhes bsgrub par bya ba la byas ba mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis chos mthun pa'i dpes bum pa brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: te / des na sbyor ba gnyi ga la yang sgra mi rtag ste zhes bsgrub par bya ba la byas ba mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dis chos mthun pa'i dpes bum pa brjod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, in both syllogisms, the example of a similar instance is stated by the words “sound is impermanent because of being a product” in the proof of sound as impermanent.

original: rtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nam mkha' brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nam mkha' brjod pa yin no //
translated: The example of a dissimilar instance is stated by the words “because of not being permanent” in the proof of sound as impermanent.

original: sbyor ba gnyi gar yang gtan tshigs ma brjod de /
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyi gar yang gtan tshigs ma brjod de /
translated: In both syllogisms, the reason is not stated.

original: de ni nye bar gtod pa las blta bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni nye bar gtod pa las blta bar bya ba yin no //
translated: It should be understood from the statement of the example.

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste bum pa byas pa ni mi rtag ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste bum pa byas pa ni mi rtag ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound is impermanent because a pot, which is a product, is impermanent.

original: de @248b bzhin du sgra yang byas ba yin no //
analyzed: de @248b bzhin du sgra yang byas ba yin no //
translated: Sound is also a product.

original: rtag pa'i nam mkha' ni ma byas ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i nam mkha' ni ma byas ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Permanent space is not a product.

original: sgra ni bum pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sgra ni bum pa yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Sound is a pot.

original: nye bar gtod pa zhes bya ba phyogs kyi chos nye bar sdud pa de las 'dod ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar gtod pa zhes bya ba phyogs kyi chos nye bar sdud pa de las 'dod ba yin no //
translated: The statement of the example is the statement of the property of the subject.

original: gzhan du yang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa yin no zhes bsgre ba mi de bzhin du med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa yin no zhes bsgre ba mi de bzhin du med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the same way, the example of the dissimilar case is also not established.

original: 'o na ci ltar 'di dag gtan tshigs ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'di dag gtan tshigs ma yin zhe na /
translated: But how are these not reasons?

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How?

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs gang zhig 'brel pa ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs de la ni bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i nus pa med de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs gang zhig 'brel pa ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs de la ni bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i nus pa med de /
translated: A reason for which the connection with the probandum is not established does not have the ability to prove the probandum.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa kho nas bsgrub bya sgrub par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa kho nas bsgrub bya sgrub par nus pa yin no //
translated: However, it is only through the connection with the probandum that it has the ability to prove the probandum.

original: sgrub par byed pa bya ba la sogs pa 'di la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa grub pa de med de des na byed pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa bya ba la sogs pa 'di la ni bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa grub pa de med de des na byed pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: But in this case of the proof, the action, etc., that connection with the probandum is not established. Therefore, these actions, etc. are not reasons.

original: de la gtan tshigs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin par bya ba'i don du grangs can la 'dri ba ni /
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin par bya ba'i don du grangs can la 'dri ba ni /
translated: In this regard, in order to show that one reason is not a reason, the Sāṃkhya asks:

original: med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “What is the reason?”

original: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam gyi bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'di ji ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog par 'gyur /
analyzed: med pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig tsam gyi bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'di ji ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog par 'gyur /
translated: How can this reason, which has the nature of a statement of non-observation of a nature incompatible with the property of the probandum, be reversed in the discordant side?

original: grangs can gyi lan ni //
analyzed: grangs can gyi lan ni //
translated: The Sāṃkhya response:

original: med pa ri bong gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa ri bong gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What does not exist, like the horn of a rabbit, does not perform a function.

original: 'di la lan brjod pa ni 'di tsam gyi ldog pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan brjod pa ni 'di tsam gyi ldog pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is “By the mere reversal of this . . .”

original: gal te yang med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa byed par ma mthong ba de lta na yang bzlog pa rgyu'i bdag nyid la 'bras bu med pa las bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: gal te yang med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa byed par ma mthong ba de lta na yang bzlog pa rgyu'i bdag nyid la 'bras bu med pa las bzlog pa ste /
translated: Even if one does not see what does not exist, like the horn of a rabbit, performing a function, the reversal of that is the existence of the effect in the cause.

original: yod pa la bya ba sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa la bya ba sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that what exists performs a function.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” means:🔽

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni med do cog go //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni med do cog go //
translated: “Everything” means all that exists.

original: khyab pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyab pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Pervasion” means

original: gang med pa de ni byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin te ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang med pa de ni byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin te ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: that whatever does not exist does not perform a function. This is because it is not the case that it does.

original: ci'i phyir de lta bu'i khyab pa ma grub ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de lta bu'i khyab pa ma grub ce na /
translated: Why is such a pervasion not established?

original: bzlog pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reverse of that.

original: bzlog pa'i 'brel pa ni gang med pa de ni mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di las bzlog pa /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i 'brel pa ni gang med pa de ni mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di las bzlog pa /
translated: The reverse of the relation is this: Whatever does not exist does not perform a function.

original: gang byed ba de ni yod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang byed ba de ni yod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reverse of that is this: Whatever performs a function exists.

original: 'di 'brel pa med bar ni bzlog ba bsgrub par bya ba med pa dang bsgrub par byed ba med pa med pa dang / mi byed pa dag @249a * //
analyzed: 'di 'brel pa med bar ni bzlog ba bsgrub par bya ba med pa dang bsgrub par byed ba med pa med pa dang / mi byed pa dag @249a * //
translated: If this were unrelated, then the reverse of the probandum and the reverse of the probans would not exist, and the non-performance of a function would not exist.

original: gis khyab pa grub pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gis khyab pa grub pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: The pervasion would not be established.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bdag gis byed pa la yod bas bya ba yin na /🔽de'i tshe chos mi mthun pa go par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bdag gis byed pa la yod bas bya ba yin na / de'i tshe chos mi mthun pa go par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the existence of the performance of a function is due to the fact that it is of the nature of that or it arises from that,🔽then it is a dissimilar example.

original: 'di nyid dpes sgrib par byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid dpes sgrib par byed pa ni /
translated: The meaning is that it is an example that obscures.

original: du ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “smoke” is the example.

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i yul na'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i yul na'o //
translated: “That” refers to the previously seen place.

original: gzhan na zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur ba na'o //
analyzed: gzhan na zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur ba na'o //
translated: “Elsewhere” refers to a hidden place.

original: rtogs par mi nus ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rtogs par mi nus ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa ni /
translated: The reason why it is not possible to understand is stated:

original: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “because of the object and the non-object.”

original: mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i byir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i byir ro //
translated: “Because of impossibility” means because of the absence of the capacity.

original: 'o na ci ltar ldog pa grub ca na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar ldog pa grub ca na /
translated: But how is the exclusion established?

original: rjes su 'gro bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Because of the pervasion.”

original: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam zhig ldog ba'i khyad par du brjod par 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam zhig ldog ba'i khyad par du brjod par 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: The mere existence of the pervasion is intended to be stated as the difference of the exclusion.

original: gtso bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the principal thing.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo yin pa ni sngar nyid bsal zin to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo yin pa ni sngar nyid bsal zin to //
translated: The principal thing is the pervasion, and that has already been refuted.

original: des na don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning:

original: ldog pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: ldog pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin /
translated: The pervasion that is a part of the exclusion is the apprehension of the relation.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gzhan gyi lugs kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba stobs chung ba yang med do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gzhan gyi lugs kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba stobs chung ba yang med do //
translated: But in the other system, there is no weak pervasion.

original: 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ni 'brel ba yod pa 'gyu ba yin na gzhan gyi lugs la ni 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ni 'brel ba yod pa 'gyu ba yin na gzhan gyi lugs la ni 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the existence of the pervasion is the existence of the relation, but in the other system, there is no existence of the relation.

original: de'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “By implication” means:

original: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis so //🔽'di dag ces bya ba ni med pa mi byed pa la sogs pa dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bas 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis so // 'di dag ces bya ba ni med pa mi byed pa la sogs pa dag ni gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: The relation is held by the force of concomitance.🔽These are not reasons, because they do not prove the probandum.

original: go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not means of knowledge, because they do not generate knowledge.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud ba'o //🔽gang gi phyir sgra mi rtag ste ;
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud ba'o // gang gi phyir sgra mi rtag ste ;
translated: Therefore, concludes.🔽Because in the case of the statement, Sound is impermanent, because it is produced, etc.,

original: byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs kyi chos nyid nye bar gtod par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs kyi chos nyid nye bar gtod par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
translated: the property of the subject is ascertained, therefore,

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na gtan tshigs su 'gyur la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na gtan tshigs su 'gyur la /
translated: if it is the property of the subject, it is a reason.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid bzlog pas khyab pa ni 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid bzlog pas khyab pa ni 'gal ba yin la /
translated: The pervasion is contradictory when the property of the subject is reversed.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid 'brel pa ma grub pa ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid 'brel pa ma grub pa ma nges pa yin no //
translated: The property of the subject is indeterminate when the relation is not established.

original: gal te rtags kyi mtshan nyid la ma khyab pa dang / ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsod pa gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rtags kyi mtshan nyid la ma khyab pa dang / ha cang khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsod pa gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But aren’t there other disputes about the definition of a reason, such as nonpervasion and overpervasion?

original: de ci ste brjod nas yod par mi 'gyur byed ce na /
analyzed: de ci ste brjod nas yod par mi 'gyur byed ce na /
translated: Why, if they are mentioned, will they not exist?

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba rnam 'grel mdzad @249b pas ni /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba rnam 'grel mdzad @249b pas ni /
translated: The author of the Pramanavarttika says,

original: tshig gi rang bzhin gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa gsal bar byas pa yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshig gi rang bzhin gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa gsal bar byas pa yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: “This is the inference for the sake of others, which is the nature of words.”

original: rnam ba gang gi sgo nas gsal bar byas snyam na yod pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam ba gang gi sgo nas gsal bar byas snyam na yod pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In what way does it clarify? It clarifies by means of existence and non-existence.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa rnam pa gnyis zhes rab tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis so /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa rnam pa gnyis zhes rab tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis so /
translated: It is taught by the method of the two types of existence and non-existence in the concordant direction.

original: rnam 'grel mdzad pa 'di thugs btang snyoms su mdzad de yal bar dor ba'o //
analyzed: rnam 'grel mdzad pa 'di thugs btang snyoms su mdzad de yal bar dor ba'o //
translated: The author of the Pramanavarttika is indifferent to this and lets it go.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshul gsum pa lhag lus pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa lhag lus pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the remainder of the three modes is to be understood.

original: 'o na ci ltar tshul gsum pa lhag lus pa rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar tshul gsum pa lhag lus pa rtogs she na /
translated: Well, how is the remainder of the three modes understood?

original: spros pa lhag ma dag ni zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: spros pa lhag ma dag ni zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected with “the remainder of the elaborations.”

original: de ltar rigs pa dang 'brel pa ci lta ba bzhin rnam par bkral ba'i rnam 'grel 'di'i brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin ci lta ba bzhin gsal ba ni gzu bor gnas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de ltar rigs pa dang 'brel pa ci lta ba bzhin rnam par bkral ba'i rnam 'grel 'di'i brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin ci lta ba bzhin gsal ba ni gzu bor gnas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir na /
translated: Thus, this commentary on the Pramiiruiiya, which is elucidated in accordance with the reasoning, is the nature of the subject matter, which is clear, because it follows the straight forward and the reverse order.

original: gzu bor gnas pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes slob par byed pa ni /
analyzed: gzu bor gnas pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes slob par byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is to be established as being straight forward.

original: kva'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kva'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word hey is used to teach this.

original: yid 'di dang 'di 'dra bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: yid 'di dang 'di 'dra bar gyur pa ni /
translated: The mind that is like this

original: de kho na nyid rtogs par gyur pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs par gyur pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: has realized reality.

original: rtag tu phyogs su lhung ba dang sdang ba'i yid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu phyogs su lhung ba dang sdang ba'i yid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is called biased and hostile when it is always partial.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu gang gis byas pa'i mun pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu gang gis byas pa'i mun pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called darkness when it is the darkness that is made by one's own and others' positions.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba nas mun pa ni zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gzu bor gnas pa'i rgyu med par bstan to //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba nas mun pa ni zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gzu bor gnas pa'i rgyu med par bstan to //
translated: The passage from “always” up to “darkness” shows that there is no cause for being impartial.

original: 'bras bu de kho na rtogs pa med par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu de kho na rtogs pa med par brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement that the result, the realization of reality, does not exist is

original: de nyid rtogs pa bsgrub min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa bsgrub min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “the realization of reality is not accomplished.”

original: 'dis ni gzu bor gnas pa med na de kho na rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes ldog pa brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni gzu bor gnas pa med na de kho na rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes ldog pa brjod do //
translated: This shows the contrapositive, that if there is no impartiality, the realization of reality does not exist.

original: de yod na ni de 'byung ngo zhes rjes su 'gro ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de yod na ni de 'byung ngo zhes rjes su 'gro ba brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of the positive concomitance is “if that exists, that arises.”

original: 'dzin to zhes bya bar shes rab phul tu byung bas mdzes pa'i tshul dbu mar gnas pa ni /
analyzed: 'dzin to zhes bya bar shes rab phul tu byung bas mdzes pa'i tshul dbu mar gnas pa ni /
translated: The one who is beautiful with the mode of the supreme wisdom that apprehends reality is the one who abides in the middle way.

original: de nyid rtogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The realization of reality is accomplished.

original: gzu bor gnas pas ni blo dang ldan pa dang don du gnyer ba dag 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzu bor gnas pas ni blo dang ldan pa dang don du gnyer ba dag 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because impartiality is the cause of intelligence and striving.

original: gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ro //
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir de ltar de kho na rtogs pas ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar de kho na rtogs pas ni /
translated: Because in that way, the realization of reality

original: gzu bor gnas ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog ba'i rjes su byed pa de'i phyir /🔽@250a * // gang gis rnam 'grel 'di ni de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gzu bor gnas ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog ba'i rjes su byed pa de'i phyir / @250a * // gang gis rnam 'grel 'di ni de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba //
translated: Because it is in accord with the one who is upright and in accord with the one who turns away from that,

original: gzu bor gnas pa der blo bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzu bor gnas pa der blo bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should establish one's mind in that way in order to understand reality.

original: gal te gzu bor gnas pa de kho na nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba gang du mthong zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzu bor gnas pa de kho na nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba gang du mthong zhe na /
translated: If someone asks, Where is it seen that being upright is the means of understanding reality?

original: gzhung lugs pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhung lugs pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Those who are authoritative means those who are authoritative in the scriptures.

original: de 'dra  nyid ces bya ba ni dpal chos kyi grags pa dang mnyam pa rnams kyis so //🔽bshad la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de 'dra  nyid ces bya ba ni dpal chos kyi grags pa dang mnyam pa rnams kyis so // bshad la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Just like that means like the glorious Dharmakirti.

original: de kho na rtogs par bya bar ro //
analyzed: de kho na rtogs par bya bar ro //
translated: In the explanation means in the explanation of reality.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni de kho na bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni de kho na bstan pa la'o //
translated: In this means in the teaching of reality.

original: rgyu bsams pa ni gzu bor gnas pa nyid yin par gnas so //
analyzed: rgyu bsams pa ni gzu bor gnas pa nyid yin par gnas so //
translated: The cause is established as being upright.

original: des na gzu bor gnas pa ni de kho na rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gis de ltar rtogs so //
analyzed: des na gzu bor gnas pa ni de kho na rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gis de ltar rtogs so //
translated: Therefore, I understand that being upright is the means of understanding reality.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir bdag 'dra dag phyogs su lhung ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir bdag 'dra dag phyogs su lhung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this context, we who are like you are biased.

original: gal te shes rab dang ldan pa khyed cag ni gzu bor gnas par de sgrub pa'i phyir rnam 'grel la phyogs su lhung la rag na /
analyzed: gal te shes rab dang ldan pa khyed cag ni gzu bor gnas par de sgrub pa'i phyir rnam 'grel la phyogs su lhung la rag na /
translated: If you who possess wisdom are unbiased, then you are biased toward the Pramānﬁ ava because you are proving that.

original: gzhan la ni gzu bor gnas pa yong kyang de grub pa med pa'i phyir ci ltar de 'dra ba bdag der phyogs su lhung zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan la ni gzu bor gnas pa yong kyang de grub pa med pa'i phyir ci ltar de 'dra ba bdag der phyogs su lhung zhe na /
translated: But if others are unbiased, then they do not establish that. So how can they be biased in that way?

original: 'dir goms zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir goms zhes gsungs te /
translated: Here, “through habituation” is stated.

original: rnam 'grel 'dir shin tu legs par goms pa de tsam nyid kyis te /
analyzed: rnam 'grel 'dir shin tu legs par goms pa de tsam nyid kyis te /
translated: Through habituation to this Pramānﬁ ava alone,

original: tsam gyi sgras ni lha la sogs pa'i mthus de kho na rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa sel ba yin te /
analyzed: tsam gyi sgras ni lha la sogs pa'i mthus de kho na rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa sel ba yin te /
translated: The word “alone” eliminates the reason that some maintain that the way to understand reality is through the power of the gods and so on.

original: shes rab ni goms pas 'thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: shes rab ni goms pas 'thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Wisdom is attained through habituation.🔽Therefore, if others,

original: des na gal te gzhan zhes bya ba bdag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: des na gal te gzhan zhes bya ba bdag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only ourselves,🔽But other people also,

original: 'on kyang skye bo gzhan dag kyang 'gyur ba ste nus par 'gyur ba'i /
analyzed: 'on kyang skye bo gzhan dag kyang 'gyur ba ste nus par 'gyur ba'i /
translated: Become capable,

original: ci'i don du zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na /
translated: For what purpose?

original: de nyid don grub ste de nyid kyi don shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid don grub ste de nyid kyi don shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of that, i.e. for the sake of understanding the goal of that.

original: de'i tshe gnyi ga yang rnam 'grel 'dir 'chol bar rigs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyi ga yang rnam 'grel 'dir 'chol bar rigs so //
translated: At that time, both are mixed in this commentary.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi lugs te /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi lugs te /
translated: The system of self and other,

original: blo rigs pa dang mi rigs par gyur pa na don 'di byas pa ste don sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: blo rigs pa dang mi rigs par gyur pa na don 'di byas pa ste don sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: when the mind is reasonable or unreasonable, this goal is accomplished, i.e. the goal is achieved.

original: rigs pas 'thad pas blang bar bya ba ni rigs pa nyid du shes la /
analyzed: rigs pas 'thad pas blang bar bya ba ni rigs pa nyid du shes la /
translated: What is to be accepted by means of logical feasibility is to be known as reasonable.

original: rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i spangs par bya ba spang par bya ba nyid su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i spangs par bya ba spang par bya ba nyid su shes par bya ste /
translated: What is to be rejected by means of illogical infeasibility is to be known as what is to be rejected.

original: blang bya dang spang bya rnam par dbye pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blang bya dang spang bya rnam par dbye pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the distinction between what is to be accepted and what is to be rejected is made.

original: gzu @250b bor gnas pa'i 'bras bu gzhan yang brjod pa ni 'dir las zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: gzu @250b bor gnas pa'i 'bras bu gzhan yang brjod pa ni 'dir las zhes bya ba'o /
translated: The result of remaining impartial is also stated here:

original: gzu bor gnas pa dag ni /
analyzed: gzu bor gnas pa dag ni /
translated: Those who remain impartial

original: gal te bdag gis bstan bcos rgya chen po byas na de'i tshe bdag gis byis pa rjes su bzung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bdag gis bstan bcos rgya chen po byas na de'i tshe bdag gis byis pa rjes su bzung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If I were to compose a treatise in an extensive way, then I would not be taking care of the childish.

original: des na mdor ba sdus pa bye'o zhes rnam par dpyod par byed de //
analyzed: des na mdor ba sdus pa bye'o zhes rnam par dpyod par byed de //
translated: Therefore, I will compose it in a concise way.

original: rgya cher ci sa me brjod ce na /
analyzed: rgya cher ci sa me brjod ce na /
translated: Why is it not stated in an extensive way?

original: rin chen zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called “precious.”

original: rin po che'i 'byung gnas grags ba'i lugs las rnyed pa'i rin che'i tshogs len par byed pa ma khrang po dag kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'byung gnas grags ba'i lugs las rnyed pa'i rin che'i tshogs len par byed pa ma khrang po dag kho na yin gyi /
translated: Only the wise are the collectors of the collection of jewels found in the system of the famous source of jewels.

original: mi ma khrang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ma khrang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not the unwise.

original: gang gi phyir ma khang po kho na len byed yin pa das na ma bshad de rgya cher ma byas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma khang po kho na len byed yin pa das na ma bshad de rgya cher ma byas so //
translated: Because only the wise are the collectors, it is not stated, it is not composed, in an extensive way.

original: yang na gang gi phyir len byed mkhas pa med pa des na /
analyzed: yang na gang gi phyir len byed mkhas pa med pa des na /
translated: Or, because there are no wise collectors,

original: bshad pa byas pa nyid kyi t'i ka ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa byas pa nyid kyi t'i ka ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not a treatise composed by the wise.

original: 'dis ni gzhung 'di byis pa'i dbang du byas nas brtsams so zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gzhung 'di byis pa'i dbang du byas nas brtsams so zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: This states that this scripture was composed for the sake of the childish.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chags phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chags phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it says, “because of attachment.”

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyir grong pa ste byis pa dag rgyan byed par 'dod par mthong ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyir grong pa ste byis pa dag rgyan byed par 'dod par mthong ste /
translated: Because of attachment to desire, the childish adorn their bodies, as is seen.

original: des na byis pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi don du rnam 'grel gyi rgyan byas pa yin no //🔽ci'i phyir 'dir rgyan byed kyi /
analyzed: des na byis pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi don du rnam 'grel gyi rgyan byas pa yin no // ci'i phyir 'dir rgyan byed kyi /
translated: Therefore, the Ornament of the Middle Way was composed for the sake of those who are childish and who strive for the goal.🔽Why was it composed here and not in a treatise on grammar?

original: gsal la byed la sogs ba'i la ni ma yin zhes dogs na de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal la byed la sogs ba'i la ni ma yin zhes dogs na de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To respond to this, it says, “in this way.”

original: de ltar gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel gyi sgo nas gzhan don sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel gyi sgo nas gzhan don sgrub pa ste /
translated: In this way, the Ornament of the Middle Way was composed for the sake of others.

original: gzhan gyi don grub par bya ba la brtson ba'i blo gang dag la yod de snying rje'i bdag nyid can de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don grub par bya ba la brtson ba'i blo gang dag la yod de snying rje'i bdag nyid can de rnams kyi'o //
translated: For those who have a mind that is intent on accomplishing the aims of others, that is, for those who are compassionate,

original: blo gros 'di ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: blo gros 'di ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this mind

original: gzhan gyi don bsgrub par rtogs pa'i blo 'di ni legs par ste dge ba dang shis pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don bsgrub par rtogs pa'i blo 'di ni legs par ste dge ba dang shis pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: is excellent, that is, it is virtuous and auspicious.

original: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos te chos sku'i bdag nyid kyi gsung rab gang yin pa de'i tshul te rnam 'grel de nyid la sems zhib mor rtogs par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos te chos sku'i bdag nyid kyi gsung rab gang yin pa de'i tshul te rnam 'grel de nyid la sems zhib mor rtogs par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: That refers to the way of the Tathagata's Dharma, that is, the scriptures that are of the nature of the body of the Dharma. It is that very commentary that causes one to understand the subtle mind.

original: gsal byed la sogs pa'i la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal byed la sogs pa'i la ni ma yin no //
translated: “That” refers to the Dharma of the Tathagata, i.e., the scriptures which have the nature of the Dharma Body. The method of that commentary is the thorough understanding of the mind, and not the consonants, etc.

original: 'on te gsal byed kyi bstan bcos kyi sgo nas kyang blo gros legs ba'i don du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gsal byed kyi bstan bcos kyi sgo nas kyang blo gros legs ba'i don du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one says that the consonants, etc. are also for the sake of the good understanding,

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the answer is “Who has seen the ocean, etc.”

original: gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel nyid rab tu zhi ba dang mthun pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'o ma'i gang chen las @251a * //
analyzed: gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel nyid rab tu zhi ba dang mthun pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // 'o ma'i gang chen las @251a * //
translated: The commentary on the scriptures is in accord with tranquility.

original: byung gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho gang 'gro ba mtha' dag dga' bskyed par byed pa dpal mo dang zla ba skyed par byed pa'i ma 'gro ba skye bos mthong ngam ci ste ma mthong ba kho na'o //
analyzed: byung gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho gang 'gro ba mtha' dag dga' bskyed par byed pa dpal mo dang zla ba skyed par byed pa'i ma 'gro ba skye bos mthong ngam ci ste ma mthong ba kho na'o //
translated: Who has seen the ocean, other than the great ocean, which gives rise to the moon and glory, and which gives rise to the joy of all beings?

original: 'o ma'i gang chen gyi don la ni gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel yin la gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho'i dad pa ni /
analyzed: 'o ma'i gang chen gyi don la ni gsung rab kyi rnam 'grel yin la gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho'i dad pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the great ocean of milk is the commentary on the scriptures, and the other oceans of faith are🔽

original: gsal byed la sogs pa'i yin no //
analyzed: gsal byed la sogs pa'i yin no //
translated: The ocean of the meaning of the great quantity of milk is the commentary on the scriptures. The other oceans are the oceans of the vowels and consonants.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pa byas pa'i dge ba yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pa byas pa'i dge ba yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa'o //
translated: Thus, etc. expresses the dedication of the virtue of the explanation.🔽Thus, by this stainless virtue which I have obtained by this good explanation, may this world be successful.

original: de ltar smad med de legs pa'i bshad pa byas pas bdag gis dge ba dri ma med pa thob pa'i dge ba 'dis 'gro ba 'di grub par gyur cig / ci 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar smad med de legs pa'i bshad pa byas pas bdag gis dge ba dri ma med pa thob pa'i dge ba 'dis 'gro ba 'di grub par gyur cig / ci 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: In what way?

original: 'gor ba kun gyi don sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: 'gor ba kun gyi don sgrub pa ste /
translated: In the accomplishment of the aim of all beings.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag ni /
translated: The whole world

original: mtho ris dang byang grol gyi mtshan nyid kyi don sgrub par ro //
analyzed: mtho ris dang byang grol gyi mtshan nyid kyi don sgrub par ro //
translated: is successful in the aim characterized by heaven and liberation.

original: bdag 'dra la 'dir 'di 'dra'i blo yod min //
analyzed: bdag 'dra la 'dir 'di 'dra'i blo yod min //
translated: I, like this, have no such intelligence here.

original: de lta'ang skye bo dga' zhing 'dir 'dod pa ;
analyzed: de lta'ang skye bo dga' zhing 'dir 'dod pa ;
translated: Nevertheless, people are pleased and desire this here.

original: / des na bdag gis lag gis 'di gtang byas //
analyzed: / des na bdag gis lag gis 'di gtang byas //
translated: Therefore, I have given this with my own hand.

original: brtse ba'i gzhan dbang lus yin rlom pas min //
analyzed: brtse ba'i gzhan dbang lus yin rlom pas min //
translated: It is not out of pride that I am in the power of love for others.

original: tshul bzhin t'i ka 'di ni byas pas na //
analyzed: tshul bzhin t'i ka 'di ni byas pas na //
translated: By composing this commentary in accordance with the treatise,

original: bsod nams tshad med bsags pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: bsod nams tshad med bsags pa gang yin pa //
translated: May the boundless merit that is thereby accumulated

original: de yis 'jig rten gshin rje'i dgra mdzes ni //
analyzed: de yis 'jig rten gshin rje'i dgra mdzes ni //
translated: Cause the world to attain the beautiful form of the Lord of Death,🔽The non-dual realization that is inexhaustible.

original: mi zad rab sgrub gnyis med mthong bar shog / dpal mkhas pa dza m'a ris sbyar ba tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi t'i ka / bam po brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: mi zad rab sgrub gnyis med mthong bar shog / dpal mkhas pa dza m'a ris sbyar ba tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan gyi t'i ka / bam po brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the Ornament of the Middle Way composed by the glorious scholar Jamari is completed.

original: // / dpal ldan dbang rgyal dbang phyug lta bur 'byor ldan kun la khyab pa yi //
analyzed: // / dpal ldan dbang rgyal dbang phyug lta bur 'byor ldan kun la khyab pa yi //
translated: The one who is filled with all the wealth like the glorious Indra,🔽The one who is the basis of the moon-like fame that pervades everywhere,

original: grags pa gsal ldan zla 'dra'i gzhi gyur mchog tu yang dag la gnas pa //
analyzed: grags pa gsal ldan zla 'dra'i gzhi gyur mchog tu yang dag la gnas pa //
translated: The one who is supremely and perfectly abiding,

original: rab dang yid can mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag par shin tu brjod bya gang //
analyzed: rab dang yid can mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag par shin tu brjod bya gang //
translated: The one who is always praised by the wise with pure minds,

original: sems can don la mngon par dga' ba'i sngo ma brtson dam pa de yi ngor //
analyzed: sems can don la mngon par dga' ba'i sngo ma brtson dam pa de yi ngor //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, the one who is dedicated to the supreme practice of virtue,🔽The one who is the ornament of all the translators, the one with excellent intelligence,

original: blo bzang gang na blo bzang blo gros bzang po dang // sgra sgyur rnams kyi rgyan gyur blo ldan bzang po yis //
analyzed: blo bzang gang na blo bzang blo gros bzang po dang // sgra sgyur rnams kyi rgyan gyur blo ldan bzang po yis //
translated: The one who is the excellent one with excellent wisdom,

original: rnam 'grel dam pa'i rgyan du gyur pa'i t'i ka 'di //
analyzed: rnam 'grel dam pa'i rgyan du gyur pa'i t'i ka 'di //
translated: This tika, an ornament of the excellent commentary,

original: gnye thang brag sna bkra shis gtsug lag khang du bsgyur //
analyzed: gnye thang brag sna bkra shis gtsug lag khang du bsgyur //
translated: was translated at the Tashi Lhakhang of Nyetang Drakna.

original: tshad ma rgyan gyi t'i ka pandi ta su ma ti dang / lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: tshad ma rgyan gyi t'i ka pandi ta su ma ti dang / lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: The tika of the Ornament of Valid Knowledge was translated by the pandit Sumati and the translator Loden Sherab.
